title: Spinach, feta and pomegranate salad
ingredients: ['285g baby spinach leaves, rinsed and drained', '1/4 red onion, sliced very thin', '60g walnut pieces', '125g crumbled feta', '25g alfalfa sprouts (optional)', '1 pomegranate, peeled and seeds separated', '4 tablespoons balsamic vinaigrette']
